group.label: Global Payments (Heartland, Unified Payments & TSYS)
group.comment: Accept credit/debit cards in your Magento store. Your customers never leave your store to complete the purchase. Begin configuration and choose with which you were onboarded to access the correct gateway.

group.label: HeartlandConnect to Heartland's Online Payments gateway
group.comment: <a href="https://developer.heartlandpaymentsystems.com/Account/Register" target="_blank">Click here to sign up for SecureSubmit account

field.label: Title
field.tooltip: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

field.label: Payment Action
field.tooltip: Choose whether you wish to capture funds immediately or authorize payment only for a delayed capture.

field.label: Allow Card Saving
field.comment: Note: to use the card saving feature, you must have multi-use token support enabled on your account. Please contact support with any questions regarding this option.

field.label: Debug
field.tooltip: Log all request to and from gateway. This can also log private data and should only be enabled in a development or stage environment.

field.label: Sandbox Mode
field.comment: Get your App Id and App Key from your Global Payments Developer Account. When you are ready for Live, please contact support to get you live credentials.

field.label: Credentials Check
field.comment: Note: the Payment Methods will not be displayed at checkout if the credentials are not correct.

field.label: Fraud Mode
field.tooltip: If Fraud is set to Off in Real Control, you can’t override the setting with the setting from Admin Dashboard
